name: The Day of the Hamster Ball
name_original: The Day of the Hamster Ball
description:
Instructions:

Hold the up, down, left or right keys to roll in a direction.

The faster you move, the more power you have. You use power to break things / defeat the rock monsters.

You have to collect 10 coins to win the game.

You messed with the wrong magicians. They came to your house and trapped you in a giant hamster ball. There's a place that can help you, if you pay the right price.
